112.content:
To call it the great shift is a bit of a stretch. I mean, honestly, I don’t think the results were that great. In my humble opinion the results were pretty terrible for a while. I mean, before it happened I was one of the best football players in college and was expected to be a top 5 pick in the NFL Draft. And now, well, that dream is completely off the table. There’s no way my new body could stand up to the riggers of playing football.

It happened on a Sunday afternoon. I was relaxing after yet another great game by watching some NFL games of teams that I would have probably ended up getting drafted by. Then, a sudden feeling of dizziness overcome me and I was unconscious in seconds. When I came to I could tell something was off. My entire body felt lighter for the most part.

Who’s body did I end up in?
112.title: Jacob

info.brief_description: The Great Shift causes the majority of the population of a city to swap bodies.
info.description:
This Great Shift has the following characteristics:

The Great Shift is a flash of blue light that swaps the bodies of the affected people, its range of action being a city and the surrounding areas. People affected by the Great Shift once will not swap again, they will be permanently affected by the Shift. The people affected are a majority of the population of the city.

It is caused by a meteorite with unknown alien technology, this story can be taken in detail or go unnoticed when writing new chapters.

The affected people are between 5 and 55 years old, in addition generally the Shift affects people who are near but can have exceptions.

The description of the city is ambiguous, totally free: in a desert, near a forest, near the sea, whatever you want.

Rules:
- Try to keep consistency.
- Try to keep additions to an appropriate length.
- Pov can change.
